channel.title: Homes on Xiang Zhou
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Xiang Zhou

item.description: About me I’m currently a 3rd-year Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science, UNC-Chapel Hill, working with Prof. Mohit Bansal. I received my bachelor’s degree at Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU) in 2018, where I worked with Prof. Kai Yu. I was a member of the IEEE honored class. I also spent one summer visiting the University of Notre Dame, working with Prof. David Chiang. Last summer, I worked with Heba Elfardy and Tom Butler as an applied scientist intern at Amazon.
